entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
